ApplicationData.text: JMMC SAMP hub to automatically start capable applications when triggered

package.name: AppleJavaExtensions
package.description: toolkit to provide better user interface on Mac, provided by Apple, Inc.

package.name: jMCS
package.description: JMMC toolkit to provide better user interface and platform integration across Mac, Linux and Windows

package.name: jSAMP
package.description: Java toolkit for the Simple Applications Messaging Protocol, by Mark Taylor

ApplicationData.acknowledgment: This tool makes extended use of jSAMP from Mark TAYLOR.
